Actions.Name: Get Balance
Actions.Description: Retrieves the account balance for given API key

Actions.Name: Lookup HLR, CNAM, MNP or Format
Actions.Description: Retrieves CNAM, MNP, HLR or number format info

Actions.Name: Get Pricing
Actions.Description: Retrieves pricing information for a single country or all

Actions.Name: Send Sms
Actions.Description: Sends one or multiple SMS to one or multiple recipients

Actions.Name: Get SMS Status
Actions.Description: Retrieves dispatch status for a given SMS ID

Actions.Name: Validate Caller ID for Voice
Actions.Description: Validates the given phone number for the use of voice API

Actions.Name: Send Text2Speech Voice Call
Actions.Description: Sends a text2voice message to a given recipient number
